subject: Re: We are experts in the sale of
body: Thanks for your response. Please the offer is only for those residing in the United States. Thanks

subject: Job Offer..
body:
Job Offer..
We are experts in the sale of Artworks and we export into United States. We are searching for reliable representatives who
can help us establish a medium of getting to our customers in the USA as well as legally receiving cash and all forms of
payment on our behalf from them as our Representative and get 5% to 10%.Email: 
bsw0373@gmail.com
Best Regards,
Mr Bryan Wright

subject: Re: Job Offer..
body:
Hello Mr. Bryan Wright,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for this opportunity. The field of Artworks sounds fascinating! I'm curious to know more about your company and the kind of art you specialize in.

Could you please provide more details about the role? What would be my responsibilities? And how would the payment process work?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Paula

subject: Re: We are experts in the sale of
body:
Hello there! Thanks for getting back to me. I'm really interested in your offer, but I'm not currently residing in the United States. Is there any chance this offer could be extended to people outside of the US?

Best wishes,
Paula

subject: Re: We are experts in the sale of
body:
Hello there! Thank you for your quick response. I'm curious, is this offer exclusive to the United States due to certain regulations or requirements? Could you please elaborate on that?

Best wishes,
Paula
